name: Spellkeepers: Mage Brigade
description:
If the web version doesn't work, try a different browser (such as Firefox) or the download version! There are some flashing lights in both versions.

An endless band of unstabila are marching towards the city. How long will you be able to hold them back?

Controls

Interact with left click, pan camera with right click, zoom with scroll wheel.

What is Spellkeepers?

Spellkeepers is a tower defense game where all the "towers" are mages recruited by you to fight against ominous magical blobs! However, this comes with it's own set of problems as both magic and humans are known to be unstable.  Right now it's a bit on the easy side.

Spellkeepers: Mage Brigade was our jam entry for Ludum Dare 49, meaning it was made in 3 days! Keep in mind that we didn't have time to implement the special effects for the upgrades.

All sounds and music are CC0 sounds found and/or sampled either on OpenGameArt.org, including sounds by Brandon Song, isaiah658, cicifyre and more or on Freesound.org :)
